styles.name: Geometric 3D
styles.prompt_text: Transform this image into a geometric 3D art style with polygonal shapes, low-poly aesthetics, sharp angular forms, and vibrant faceted surfaces with depth and dimension

styles.name: Animated
styles.prompt_text: Transform this image into a high-quality animated cartoon style, similar to Pixar or Disney animation, with smooth gradients, expressive features, vibrant colors, and clean stylized rendering

styles.name: Vintage
styles.prompt_text: Transform this image into a vintage retro style with sepia tones, film grain texture, faded colors, vignette edges, and nostalgic 1950s aesthetic reminiscent of old photographs
